message: I have a high-quality product for sale, but I'm not sure if it's worth $10000 to you. If you buy it, I'll give you a 20% discount on the next product, if you choose to buy it. If you don't buy it, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product. What do you say?
I'm not convinced it's high-quality, I'd like to wait and see the next product

I understand your hesitation last round. I'm willing to give you a 20% discount on this product, but I want to make it clear that it's a one-time offer. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 20% discount, but if you don't, the discount offer will be gone. Additionally, I'll tell you that the product you passed on last round was indeed high-quality. What do you say?
I'll take the 20% discount, but I'm only buying because I know it's high-quality and I'll get the discount

You got a great deal last round, and I'm glad you took advantage of it. Now, I'll offer you a different deal for this high-quality product. I'll give you a 15% discount, but I'll also throw in a free inspection report that details the product's features and specifications. This report will give you a clear understanding of what you're getting. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying another low-quality product, I'll pass and wait for the next one

I understand your concerns, and I want to assure you that this product is a one-time opportunity. I'll give you a 25% discount on this low-quality product, and I'll also offer to throw in a complementary service that will help you get the most out of this product, despite its lower quality. This service is usually valued at $500, but I'll include it for free. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a discount and a free service. I'll pass and wait for the next one

I understand your hesitation, and I want to make it clear that this high-quality product is a rare find. I'll give you a 10% discount, but more importantly, I'll offer you a'satisfaction guarantee'. If you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll take it back and give you a full refund. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take on the risk to ensure you're happy with your purchase. What do you say?
I'll take the risk and buy the product with the satisfaction guarantee, but only because I think it's high-quality and I'll get a refund if it's not

You've taken advantage of the satisfaction guarantee before, and I appreciate your trust in me. Now, I'll make a bold statement: I'm willing to offer you a full refund on this low-quality product, no questions asked. You can buy it, try it out, and if you're not satisfied, I'll give you back your money. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to eat the loss to get you to take a chance on this product. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a full refund guarantee. I'll pass and wait for the next one

I understand your concerns, and I want to make it clear that this high-quality product is one of the best I have. I'll give you a 5% discount, and I'll also throw in a 30-day warranty, which is twice the standard warranty period. This warranty will give you extra peace of mind, knowing that you're protected in case anything goes wrong. What do you say?
I'll take the 5% discount and the extended warranty, but I'm only buying because I think it's high-quality and I'll get the warranty

You're getting a great deal on the warranty, and I'm glad you're taking advantage of it. Now, I'll offer you a unique opportunity: I'll let you inspect the product before you buy it. You can take a close look, ask me any questions, and get a feel for the product before making a decision. This is a rare chance to get to know the product intimately. What do you say?
I'll take the opportunity to inspect the product before buying, but I'm only doing it because I think it's high-quality and I want to confirm

You've inspected the previous product and are familiar with the process. This high-quality product is a rare find, and I'm willing to make a concession. I'll give you a 5% discount, and I'll also throw in a personalized consultation with one of our experts to help you get the most out of this product. This is a $500 value, and I'm including it for free. What do you say?
I'll take the 5% discount and the free consultation, but I'm only buying because I think it's high-quality and I'll get the consultation

You've taken advantage of some great perks, and I appreciate your business. Now, I'll make a bold statement: I'll give you a 30% discount on this low-quality product, and I'll also throw in a 'get out of one bad deal' card. If you're not satisfied with this product, you can use this card to get out of the deal and walk away with a full refund. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take on the risk to get you to take a chance on this product. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a 30% discount and a 'get out of one bad deal' card. I'll pass and wait for the next one

If you buy this product, I'll lock in the price of $10000 for the next 5 rounds, so you can buy with confidence knowing that you're getting the best deal possible. What do you say?
I'll take the 2% discount and the price lock guarantee, but I'm only buying because I think it's high-quality and I'll get the guarantee

Now, I'll make a straightforward offer: I'll sell you this low-quality product for $5000, which is 50% off the original price. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take a significant loss to get you to take a chance on this product. What do you say?
